dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body: RIAA6132: Hi, this is the RIAA ( Recording Industry Association of America). We've found traces of pirated music on your computer using some sort of FTP program. You can and will be fined 1000-5000 $ per/song. During the next week you will recieve a court hearing and we will have a search warrant for your possesions. Thanks for your cooperation in advance. My ID number is 6540-092-435.
